metadata.title: CVE-2024-26811 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: validate payload size in ipc responseIf installing malicious ksmbd-tools, ksmbd.mountd can return invalid ipcresponse to ksmbd kernel server. ksmbd should validate payload size ofipc response from ksmbd.mountd to avoid memory overrun orslab-out-of-bounds. This patch validate 3 ipc response that has payload.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
